summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF export functionality for tax reports. Backend API endpoint working correctly, frontend integration successful with proper download functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Tax calculation not applied to exempt categories (expected behavior but test item was in exempt category)
minor_issues.impact: Test showed $0 tax on screen item which is correctly exempt

passed_tests: PDF contains valid PDF data (starts with %PDF header)
Tax summary data endpoint returns all required fields
Export PDF button visible on Tax Reports tab
Export PDF button has correct text and is enabled
Clicking Export PDF successfully downloads PDF file
Downloaded PDF has correct naming pattern (tax_report_YYYYMMDD.pdf)
Tax stats cards display daily/weekly/monthly data correctly
Taxable vs Exempt sales section displays correct values
Category breakdown table shows 6 data rows with proper categorization
All tax report UI components render correctly

success_percentage.backend: 95% (34/37 tests passed - 3 minor failures related to test data setup)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All PDF export and UI functionality working correctly)
